enigma_edit.lua.res

Class Tiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • enigma_edit.lua.data.Data
      • enigma_edit.lua.data.SourceData
        • enigma_edit.lua.data.Value
          • enigma_edit.lua.data.Table
            • enigma_edit.lua.res.Tiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indexed, Resolver, Source, Typed, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,Variable>>

    public class Tiles
extends Table
implements Resolver
    Default resolver (by tile repository). This resolver simply looks up the tile definition in a table provided to the constructor. Note that this is not a resolver in the sense of the lua API, but represents the lua table given as the final sub-resolver. As a consequence, this resolver does not have a constructor.
